Music

Besides from having played on a band for dozens of years. I love music, here is what I'm listening to.

You won't probably enjoy most of it.
Ranges of emotion: loud, soft, violent, abstract, instrumental, diverse, calm, deep, fast.

Some people find it extreme. To me commercial music and pop music is as extreme in the way it is formatted, sang (no instrumental music no more), and marketed imposed.
